Package environment.world.crumb

Class CrumbWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.World<Crumb>
      • environment.world.crumb.CrumbWorld
  • public class CrumbWorld
extends World<Crumb>
    A class for a CrumbWorld, being a layer of the total world, that contains Crumbs.

      • effectuate

        protected void effectuate​(Influence inf)
        Brings a given influence in effect in this world. This method knows the effects of certain influences and realizes them in this world.
        Specified by:
        effectuate in class World<Crumb>
        Parameters:
        inf - the influence to bring in effect

      • putCrumb

        protected void putCrumb​(int x,
                        int y,
                        int number)
        Puts a new Crumb on the given coordinates in this CrumbWorld with a specified initial number of crumbs. If there already is a Crumb on the specified coordinate, adds the value of number to that Crumb. Updates the gui to show the crumb.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the Crumb that we want to put down
        y - y-coordinate of the Crumb that we want to put down
        number - the number of crumbs to be laid

      • pickCrumb

        protected void pickCrumb​(int x,
                         int y,
                         int number)

      • put

        public void put​(int x,
                int y,
                int number)
        Puts a new Crumb on a specified coordinate (x, y). If a Crumb on that position already exists, number is added to the number that Crumb.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate for the new Crumb to put
        y - the y-coordinate for the new Crumb to put
        number - the number of crumbs in the new Crumb to put

      • pick

        public void pick​(int x,
                 int y,
                 int number)
        Picks some crumbs from a Crumb on a specified coordinate (x, y). If number is larger than the number of that Crumb, Crumb is removed.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the Crumb to pick from
        y - the y-coordinate of the Crumb to pick from
        number - the number of crumbs to pick from the Crumb on (x, y)

      • placeItem

        public void placeItem​(Crumb crumb)
        Adds a Crumb to this CrumbWorld.
        Specified by:
        placeItem in class World<Crumb>
        Parameters:
        crumb - the Crumb to place in this world

      • placeItems

        public void placeItems​(java.util.Collection<Crumb> crumbs)
        Adds Crumbs to this CrumbWorld.
        Specified by:
        placeItems in class World<Crumb>
        Parameters:
        crumbs - the Crumbs to place in this world
